ComicInfo.Title: The Common Denominator
ComicInfo.Summary: Spider-Man's partner this time around is none other than the smartest man in Marvel - REED RICHARDS, MR. FANTASTIC! What is "The Common Denominator" and how does it figure into the scheme of the new and improved Everyman? Here's a hintâ€” it has to do with Mr. Fantastic, as Reed Richards is abruptly robbed of his most powerful weapon...his brilliant mind!
